__e: From me far off, with others all too near.
You seem to hold yourself aloof from me, and a tension seems to grow between us and... You don't feel that?
It's like a dream, far away from everything.
Why is this happening? Everything from the fact that it is significantly removed from our country.
I'm so far away from everything that I don't know anything of what's happening outside.
No longer than anything else, really.
That star is so far away... .. that by the time the light from it reaches us here on Earth,... .. it might not even be up there any more.
The little bird looks at not today but a far away place where it wants to see.
during the study of prices in the store at a distant location of the window;

Your world is so far from the one I know.

we just thought, instead of going far away, it would be more fun to stay home, where things are not so different... and, do... the things we do every day.

Oh, I know you've had a spell of hard work with your back and hands... And a bit of being homeless and penniless... In a foreign land and I respect you for it.
Still not far enough. Damn it.
My distant friend, like this you've never grown as a human.
